install.name: bridgeofhope
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description:
Shape 5 - Bridge of Hope 2009


This template is for members of the Shape 5 Joomla Template Club only, it is not free or open to the public domain.

For tutorials and additional information check out:
Bridge of Hope Demo.

Click here to visit Shape5.com

param.name: spacer1
param.default: Make sure to hover your mouse over each title in this column for a full description of what each field does.

param.name: xml_menuname
param.label: Menu Name
param.description: What menu would you like to use for the default default menu?

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_1
param.label: Text label 1
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the first menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_2
param.label: Text label 2
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the second menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_3
param.label: Text label 3
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the third menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_4
param.label: Text label 4
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the fourth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_5
param.label: Text label 5
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the fifth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_6
param.label: Text label 6
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the sixth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_7
param.label: Text label 7
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the seventh menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_8
param.label: Text label 8
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the eighth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_9
param.label: Text label 9
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the nineth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_10
param.label: Text label 10
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the tenth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_text_menu_10
param.label: Text label 10
param.description: Enter what sub text you would like for the tenth menu item

param.name: xml_s5_body_width
param.label: Body Width
param.description: What width would you like for the website?

param.name: xml_s5_left_width
param.label: Left Column Width
param.description: What width in pixels would you like the left column to be?

param.name: xml_s5_right_width
param.label: Right Column Width
param.description: What width in pixels would you like the right column to be?

param.name: xml_s5_jsmenu
param.label: Effect Script
param.description: Choose which script you would like to power the drop down menu.

param.name: xml_s5_menu
param.label: Menu Type
param.description: Enter in 1 for No-MooMenu, 2 for Suckerfish, 3 for Fading No-Moo, or 4 for Nothing

param.name: xml_s5_subtext
param.label: Enable Subtext
param.description: Choose to enable the sub text on the drop down menu.

param.name: xml_s5_shadows
param.label: Show Shadows
param.description: Choose to show or hide the shadows

param.name: xml_s5_fontcolor
param.label: Site Wide Font Color
param.description: Enter the font color in Hex for the site wide color.

param.name: xml_s5_sitecolor
param.label: Site Wide Color
param.description: Enter the site color in Hex for the site wide color for the back of the drop down menu, breadcrumbs, left, right and bottom module positions.

param.name: xml_s5_accordcolor
param.label: Menu Colors
param.description: Enter the Hex color if you are using the S5 acccordion menu.

param.name: xml_s5_highlightcolor
param.label: Sub/Mod Font Color
param.description: Enter the font color in Hex for the sub menu and intro word module text

param.name: xml_s5_mod1
param.label: -mod1 Back Color
param.description: Enter the Hex color you would like for the -mod1 module suffix background color.

param.name: xml_s5_mod2
param.label: -mod2 Back Color
param.description: Enter the Hex color you would like for the -mod2 module suffix background color.

param.name: xml_s5_user1
param.label: -user1 Back Color
param.description: Enter the Hex color you would like for the -user1 module suffix background color.

param.name: xml_s5_user2
param.label: -user2 Back Color
param.description: Enter the Hex color you would like for the -user2 module suffix background color.

param.name: xml_s5_login
param.label: Login Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the Login button.

param.name: xml_s5_facebook
param.label: Facebook Text
param.description: Enter the text you desire for the Register button.

param.name: xml_s5_twitter
param.label: Twitter URL
param.description: Enter the url you desire for the twitter button.

param.name: xml_s5_rss
param.label: RSS URL
param.description: Enter the url you desire for the rss button.

param.name: xml_s5_backcolor
param.label: Background Color
param.description: Enter the URL the background color for your site. Enter transparent for none.

param.name: xml_s5_backimage
param.label: Top Horizontal Background
param.description: Enter the URL to a background image that will repeat horiztonally across your site. Leave blank for none.

param.name: xml_s5_headerback
param.label: Body Background
param.description: Enter the URL to a background image that will repeat throughout the body of your site. Leave blank for none.

param.name: xml_s5_seourl
param.label: Your Site URL if SEO enabled
param.description: If you turn on SEO URLs and your site loses its CSS formatting and flat out doesn't work enter your full site url here. Example: http://www.mysite.com

param.name: xml_s5_tooltips
param.label: Enable Tooltips?
param.description: Enable the tooltips feature for your site NOTE: it is highly recommened to disable if you are not planning to use

param.name: xml_s5_lytebox
param.label: Enable Lytebox?
param.description: Enable the lytebox feature for your images NOTE: it is highly recommened to disable if you are not planning to use
